address.docs:
**, int**: The I²C address of the driver. Defaults to `0x20`.

*See also: [MCP23008 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp230xx.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this MCP23008 component.

*See also: [MCP23008 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp230xx.html#configuration-variables)*

open_drain_interrupt.docs:
**, boolean**: Configure the interrupt pin to open-drain mode. Useful when the MCP23008’s power supply is greater than 3.3 volts. Note that this pin will require a pull-up resistor (to 3.3 volts) when this mode is enabled.

*See also: [MCP23008 Component](https://esphome.io/components/mcp230xx.html#configuration-variables)*
